channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- fscrypt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- fscrypt

item.title: CVE-2022-25327|2024-09-17T04:15:20.454Z -- google%20llc -- fscrypt
item.description: The PAM module for fscrypt doesn't adequately validate fscrypt metadata files, allowing users to create malicious metadata files that prevent other users from logging in. A local user can cause a denial of service by creating a fscrypt metadata file that prevents other users from logging into the system. We recommend upgrading to version 0.3.3 or above
